name: Likelihood
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Likelihood
description:
Likelihood

A bucketized representation of likelihood of various separate facial characteristics, meant to give highly stable results across model upgrades.

See Face.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"
face = image.face

face.likelihood.to_h.count #=> 7
face.likelihood.sorrow? #=> false
face.likelihood.sorrow #=> "VERY_UNLIKELY"

methods.name: joy
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Likelihood#joy
methods.description: Joy likelihood rating. Possible values are VERY_UNLIKELY, UNLIKELY, POSSIBLE, LIKELY, and VERY_LIKELY.

methods.name: joy?
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Likelihood#joy?
methods.description: Joy likelihood. Returns true if #joy is POSSIBLE, LIKELY, or VERY_LIKELY.
